summary: A personal and insightful interview with Ben Starr, the voice actor for Clive Rosfield in Final Fantasy XVI. The interview explores his journey, passion for the franchise, and experiences as a voice actor.

events_list.video_caption: The video opens with a black screen displaying a white rectangle containing the text "MATURE 17+" and "ESRB" in bold letters, followed by a list of content descriptors: "Violence, Blood and Gore, Sexual Themes, Partial Nudity, Strong Language." The scene transitions to a setting where two individuals are seated in front of a backdrop featuring a fiery, fantasy-themed image. The person on the left, identified as Jamie Poling, Video Coordinator at GameStop, is wearing a black shirt and has shoulder-length hair. The person on the right, Ben Starr, is holding a microphone and is dressed in a black long-sleeve shirt with a small red emblem on the chest. The text overlay introduces Ben Starr as the voice actor for Clive Rosfield in FINAL FANTASY XVI. The conversation between Jamie and Ben Starr is captured, with Ben Starr speaking into the microphone. The text overlay changes to display Ben Starr's name and his role as the voice of Clive Rosfield. The video continues with close-up shots of Ben Starr speaking, with subtitles appearing at the bottom of the screen, capturing his dialogue. The background remains consistent with the fantasy-themed imagery, and the atmosphere is professional and focused on the discussion. The video concludes with a black screen displaying the text "FINAL FANTASY XVI" in bold white letters, followed by the release date "COMING SOON" in smaller white text, indicating the upcoming release of the game.
events_list.audio_caption: The audio clip starts with a female speaker greeting and introducing Ben Starr, the actor for Clive Rosfield in Final Fantasy XVI, asking how he's doing. Starr replies that he's doing pretty good, mentioning the game's upcoming release and the excitement surrounding it. He explains the long development process and the special feeling of sharing it with everyone, expressing his enthusiasm to talk about it. There is no music or background sounds in this clip.

events_list.video_caption: In the video, two individuals are seated in front of a vibrant poster featuring a fiery scene with characters from the FINAL FANTASY series. The person on the left, wearing a black shirt and sporting a tattoo on their arm, is engaged in a conversation with the person on the right, who is dressed in a black long-sleeve shirt and holding a microphone. The dialogue begins with the person on the right expressing their happiness to be there, followed by a transition to the person on the left asking a question. The person on the right responds with enthusiasm, discussing the significance of FINAL FANTASY to them, highlighting its rich storytelling and emotional characters. The atmosphere is lively and engaging, with both individuals appearing animated and passionate about the topic. The background poster adds a dynamic and thematic element to the setting, enhancing the overall visual appeal of the scene.
events_list.audio_caption: The audio clip begins with a light and friendly tone as a female speaker welcomes someone and states that she has some questions to ask, saying she wants to "pick your mind". Transitioning to a slightly deeper tone, a male speaker describes what Final Fantasy means to him, emphasizing "incredible worlds," "deep, rich storytelling," and "emotional characters," with an overall enthusiastic feeling. The female speaker then asks how excited he is for the launch. He replies with great excitement, emphasizing that he is "so excited" and feels honored.

events_list.video_caption: The video begins with two individuals seated in front of a dramatic backdrop featuring fiery imagery and a character from a video game. The person on the left, wearing a black shirt and displaying a tattoo on their arm, listens attentively as the person on the right, dressed in a black long-sleeve shirt and holding a microphone, speaks. The text on the screen reads, "What do you hope people feel when they play this game?" The scene transitions to a close-up of the person on the right, who continues to speak, with the text, "I hope they will-," followed by, "will allow people to," and finally, "a little bit of themselves in it." The video then shifts to a video game scene, showing a character in medieval attire standing in a grand hall, with the text, "I think games are their most powerful." The next scene depicts two characters standing on a rocky shore, gazing out at the sea under a cloudy sky, with the text, "Yes, it's." The video then shows a group of characters in a dimly lit room, with one character in a red outfit speaking, accompanied by the text, "and it helps us heal and it helps us." The final scene features a character in a red outfit interacting with a dog, with the text, "and it helps us heal and it helps us," emphasizing the emotional and healing aspects of the game.
events_list.audio_caption: The audio clip features a male speaker expressing his hope that the game will allow people to see a little bit of themselves, suggesting that games are most powerful when they make us better comprehend the world. He speaks with a thoughtful and hopeful tone. A sound effect follows, but is not elaborated on.

events_list.video_caption: The video begins with a scene set in a medieval environment, where a group of people, including knights and townsfolk, are gathered outside a castle. The atmosphere is tense as a knight in red armor stands prominently, addressing the crowd. The text on the screen reads, "So you are a huge fan of FINAL FANTASY," indicating a discussion about the popular video game series. The scene transitions to an indoor setting where two individuals are seated in front of a large poster depicting a fiery, fantastical landscape. One person, holding a microphone, speaks to the other, who listens attentively. The text on the screen reads, "how it felt for you," suggesting an interview or discussion about personal experiences related to the game. The video then shifts to a close-up of the person with the microphone, who continues to speak, with the text on the screen reading, "It felt, is feeling," indicating a reflection on the emotional impact of the game. The scene transitions to a video game scene featuring a character standing on a rocky cliff, gazing at a dramatic sky with the sun partially obscured by clouds. The text on the screen reads, "that changed my life when I was a kid," highlighting the profound influence of the game on the speaker's life. The video then returns to the indoor setting, where the person with the microphone continues to speak, with the text on the screen reading, "after I played FINAL FANTASY VIII," referencing a specific game in the series. The scene transitions to a video game scene showing a character in armor standing next to a white horse, with the text on the screen reading, "on this, this franchise," indicating a discussion about the broader impact of the game series. The video concludes with the person with the microphone speaking again, with the text on the screen reading, "is something incredibly special," emphasizing the unique and significant experience of playing the game. The video weaves together real-life interviews and video game scenes to explore the emotional and cultural impact of the FINAL FANTASY series.
events_list.audio_caption: The audio features two speakers: a female interviewer and a male interviewee with a clear speaking voice. The interview begins with the interviewer confirming the interviewee's love for the Final Fantasy series, before asking how it felt to be the main character in the latest game. The interviewee responds by explaining how surreal it is to be involved in a series that changed his life, and he expresses his excitement and nervousness about sharing it with everyone.

events_list.video_caption: In the video, a man and a woman are seated in front of a dramatic backdrop featuring a fiery scene with a young boy in the foreground. The woman, dressed in a black shirt, holds a notepad and pen, while the man, wearing a black long-sleeve shirt, holds a microphone. The man begins speaking, and subtitles appear at the bottom of the screen, reading, "Are you able to speak all super secret." He continues to speak, and the subtitles change to, "and I auditioned for a much smaller role," followed by, "And then I heard the performance director," and then, "and then I blind." The man's facial expressions and gestures suggest he is recounting a story or sharing an experience. The background remains consistent throughout, with the fiery scene and the young boy prominently displayed, creating a dramatic and intense atmosphere. The video focuses on the man's narrative, with the subtitles providing context to his words.
events_list.audio_caption: The audio begins with a female speaker asking about the audition process for a role. A male speaker responds, noting the secrecy of video game auditions involving code names. He describes auditioning for a smaller fantasy video game role, initially feeling he didn't perform well. He mentions then being asked to cold-read a series of lines, which went well, leading to him getting the part. He describes being told what game it was, screaming in a pillow, and then being sworn to secrecy. He speaks with an excited tone, and mentions friends' anticipation for the game. Finally, he states he's had to keep quiet about it for a while.

events_list.video_caption: The video begins with two individuals seated in front of a dramatic backdrop featuring fiery imagery and characters, engaged in a conversation. The person on the left, dressed in a black shirt and holding papers, speaks animatedly, while the person on the right, also in black, listens attentively with a microphone in hand. The scene transitions to a close-up of an animated character with blonde hair, set against a dark background, with subtitles reading, "And the response from all." The focus then shifts to another animated character with dark hair, with subtitles stating, "I know this is a community who." The video then returns to the interview setting, where the person on the right speaks into the microphone, with subtitles reading, "a custodian of the next protagonist." An image of various animated characters appears on the screen, with subtitles explaining, "Image of the DISSIDIA protagonists." The conversation continues with the person on the right discussing their experience with the franchise, with subtitles reading, "we've been with this franchise." The video concludes with the person on the right expressing gratitude, with subtitles reading, "do you want to do that for us?" and "But it's really cool." Throughout the video, the backdrop remains consistent, featuring fiery imagery and characters, creating a cohesive and thematic atmosphere.
events_list.audio_caption: The clip starts with a female speaker expressing gratitude that the male speaker can discuss his role as Clive. The male speaker responds, stating the role is special and the fan response is the best part. He describes the community's adoration and his role as a "custodian of the next protagonist," referencing the "dissidia protagonist" image. He mentions feeling the pressure not to "screw it up." He concludes by expressing excitement for how people will enjoy the game. Throughout, both speakers speak in a warm, friendly tone.

events_list.video_caption: The video features an interview setting with two individuals seated in front of a dramatic backdrop depicting a fiery scene with characters, likely from a video game or movie. The interviewer, holding a microphone and a piece of paper, engages in a conversation with the interviewee, who is dressed in a black long-sleeve shirt. The discussion revolves around the interviewee's transition from traditional acting to voice acting, with subtitles providing context to their dialogue. The scene transitions to a video game environment, showcasing characters in a dark, atmospheric setting, hinting at the interviewee's involvement in video game projects. The interviewee elaborates on the filming process, mentioning that they were filmed while performing voice acting, and reflects on the four-year journey, sharing insights into the behind-the-scenes experiences. The video then shifts to dynamic action sequences within the game, featuring characters in combat, emphasizing the interviewee's growth and learning throughout the process. The final frames depict a character in a battle scene, with the interviewee discussing the challenges and rewards of their work, highlighting the immersive and intense nature of the video game world.
events_list.audio_caption: A female speaker with a curious tone introduces a conversation about the speaker's background in acting and their transition to voice acting. The speaker with a positive tone responds, noting the bandwidth allowed in the project and the presence of actors from theatrical, film, and TV backgrounds, then describes how auditions were filmed to account for facial capture. The speaker reflects on their initial struggles, experiencing "imposter syndrome." However, they convey they learned a lot and can take their skills back to film, TV, and stage, while also noting the opportunity to work with people whose work they admire.

events_list.video_caption: The video features an interview setting with two individuals seated in front of a dramatic backdrop depicting a fiery scene with a character in the foreground. The interviewer, holding a microphone, engages with the interviewee, who is holding papers. The conversation revolves around a scene from a video game, with the interviewee discussing the emotional impact and challenges of portraying it. The scene transitions to a video game sequence showing a young character in a red outfit interacting with armored figures in a dimly lit environment, emphasizing the game's atmosphere and the emotional depth of the scenes. The interviewee reflects on the raw emotion and the opportunity to play the game, expressing excitement and appreciation for the experience. The video alternates between the interview setting and the game footage, highlighting the connection between the interviewee's personal experience and the game's narrative. The interviewee's expressions and gestures convey enthusiasm and a deep connection to the game, while the game footage showcases the immersive and emotional storytelling of the game.
events_list.audio_caption: The clip begins with a female interviewer asking about filming a challenging scene and getting into the right headspace. A male speaker responds, discussing how he deals with emotional scenes, sometimes preferring to jump in without overthinking to achieve authenticity and realness. He mentions instances where scenes were captured on the first take because they felt genuine. He describes the overall goal to make everything as real as possible, even within the fantastical setting, emphasizing the importance of honesty at its base level. In between, a brief instance of distressed weeping is heard. The male speaker wraps up, emphasizing the opportunity to celebrate the raw and immediate moments captured during the filming process.

events_list.video_caption: The video features a man and a woman seated in front of a dramatic backdrop depicting a fiery scene with a character in the foreground. The woman, dressed in a black shirt and holding a piece of paper, asks the man, who is wearing a black long-sleeve shirt and holding a microphone, a question. The man begins to respond, and the camera zooms in on him as he speaks, with subtitles appearing at the bottom of the screen. The subtitles read, "with this sort of thing, because in the recording process, these relationships where stuff, reacting to a person right next to you." The man continues to speak, and the subtitles change to, "And even though, you know, and understand for the rest of the game." The video then transitions to a scene from a video game, showing two characters in a dimly lit environment, engaged in a conversation. The man continues to speak, and the subtitles read, "And even though, you know, and understand for the rest of the game." The video concludes with the man still speaking, with the subtitles reading, "and understand for the rest of the game." The overall atmosphere of the video is serious and focused, with the man providing insights into the recording process and the importance of relationships in the game.
events_list.audio_caption: The audio clip starts with a female speaker beginning a question, which she characterizes as her "last question" and says it's "about moments of improv." A male speaker then begins to answer in a conversational tone, saying "Yes, so I think that... with this sort of thing, because the writing is so good, there isn't that width to improvise." He goes on to say that due to the recording process, he was in the booth with other actors and they were able to create relationships, which led to unexpected results, and ultimately contributed to the game. This is followed by a shift to what sounds like the game music. The music is of a background music style, with a somber and serious tone.
